display_information.name: Atlas Editor
display_information.description: Interactive org chart editor for Slack organizations
display_information.long_description:
Atlas Editor provides a visual, interactive way to manage your Slack organization structure. Features include:

• Interactive org chart visualization
• Drag-and-drop manager relationship changes
• Profile field editing with real-time sync
• Staged changes with preview and undo
• Complete audit logging

Perfect for HR teams, managers, and administrators who need to maintain accurate organizational data in Slack.
